name: Wodex
description: WMT is the only platform token in the Woma ecosystem. In the business system of WODEX Ward Exchange, WMT plays a very important role, and it is also the proof of rights and interests of WODEX Meta universe NFT. WMT holders have the right to vote to determine the disposal of works owned by WODEX, sign the IP and the direction of future NFT art collections, and determine the exhibition method and duration, etc., and enjoy the WODEX DAO ecological governance rights, and participate in different levels according to holdings NFT activities. Through WODEX tokens, users can be anchored to the long-term commercial value of WODEX, allowing users to share the ecological growth dividend.
